entry.def: You can use global to describe something that happens in all parts of the world or affects all parts of the world.

example.ex: On a global scale, AIDS may well become the leading cause of infant death.
example.tran: 艾滋病很可能会成为造成全球婴儿死亡的首要原因。

entry.def: A global view or vision of a situation is one in which all the different aspects of it are considered.

example.ex: ...the global view, the ability to make wider decisions based on a knowledge of all the facts, not just some of them.
example.tran: 大局观——基于全部而非部分事实作出更加宏观的决定的能力
对当代社会的总体看法

means.word_mean: 1. involving the entire earth; not limited or provincial in scope;
2. having the shape of a sphere or ball;

Sentence.sentence: Global warming is a trend toward warmer conditions around the world.
Scientists are in general agreement that the warmer conditions we have been experiencing are at least in part the result of a human-induced global warming trend

Parents and students who have invested heavily in higher education worry about graduates' job prospects as technological advances and changes in domestic and global markets transform professions in ways that reduce wages and cut jobs.

sentences.en: A global environmental meeting is going to be held here.
sentences.cn: 一个全球环境会议将在这里举行。

sentences.en: The crisis here caught the global attention.
sentences.cn: 这里的危机引起了全世界的注意。
